alert.note: Alert for Acadia; St. Landry (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 08 at 6:40PM CST until February 08 at 7:15PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lake Charles has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Acadia Parish in southwestern Louisiana... Southwestern St. Landry Parish in central Louisiana... * Until 715 PM CST. * At 640 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Richard to near Maxie to near Egan, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Crowley, Eunice, Rayne, Church Point, Iota, Sunset, Cankton, Mowata, Maxie, Mire, Savoy, Egan, Lawtell, Swords, Branch, Richard, Estherwood and Midland. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 73 and 90. Interstate 49 near mile marker 13. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for south central, central and southwestern Louisiana. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for south central, central and southwestern Louisiana.
